description: This file defines a ViewModel class SharedDeliveryViewModel that provides reactive data about the current delivery order, including the active order and estimated time remaining, sourced from DeliveryRepository.

classes.name: SharedDeliveryViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel that exposes delivery status data such as the active order and ETA to the UI.

methods.name: SharedDeliveryViewModel
methods.description: Initializes the ViewModel, exposing LiveData fields for active delivery order and ETA remaining.
